page.title: 06CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content:
IN THE SCHOOL YARD ONE OF THE GOOD GAMES IS "COPS AND ROBBERS". THERE ARE TWO TEAMS,ONE TEAM ARE COPS AND THE OTHER TEAM ARE ROBBERS. THE COPS LET THE ROBBERS GET AWAY AND THEN CHASE THEM.IF THEY CATCH THEM THEY PUT IN A PLACE THE WE'VE DECIDE TO BE THE PRISON.IF ANOTHER ROBBER TOUCHES A ROBBER IN PRISON THE ROBBER CAN GET OUT OF PRISON. THE COPS BECOME THE ROBBERS WHEN THEY HAVE CAUGHT ALL THE ROBBERS.
ANOTHER GOOD GAME WE PLAY IS ROUND ERS IN THE YARD WITHOUT A BAT.THE BA TTING TEAM HIT THE BALL WITH THEIR HANDS.THE FIELDERS THROW THE BALL BACK TO THE BOWLER WHO STUMPS IT ON THE BOWLERS CIRCLE AND THEN THE RUNNER IS OUT IF HE IS IN BETWEEN THE BASES. THE TEAM THAT WINS IS THE TEAM THAT HAS THE MOST ROUNDERS.
